original_title: ED治療 医療コンシェルジュ 瀧本梨絵（仮） ドキュメント作品 医療の限界と壁を超える挑戦
overview: Rie Takimoto, a medical concierge working at a clinic in Tokyo, was challenging onanism with "bare hands", which is not possible with conventional ED treatment, in order to demonstrate the "new ED treatment method" proposed by the director. However, a popular actress, Hibiki Otsuki, appears in front of Takimoto who is depressed because the results are not good, and the ED is solved without difficulty! Takimoto finally decides when he sees it.
title: Erectile Dysfunction Treatment Concierge Rie Takimoto(Not Her Real Name) A Documentary A Challenge To Take On The Limits Of Medical Treatment
